headline: A Look at General Dynamics’s Valuation Following $1.7 Billion U.S. Navy Shipbuilding Contract
summary: General Dynamics (GD) recently drew attention after its NASSCO division secured a $1.7 billion contract from the U.S. Navy for two John Lewis-class replenishment oilers. This contract also positions the company for further shipbuilding opportunities as part of a broader agreement. See our latest analysis for General Dynamics. General Dynamics has gained attention not only with this new Navy contract, but also through a strong run in its share price, which is up 31.8% since the start of the...
